meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1752.

td.p: Lynn Carpenter, a personnel specialist from San Antonio, Texas
Robert Slaven, an office automation specialist from Yellowknife, Northwest Territories
Thom Stark, a senior research analyst from El Cerrito, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $27,401)

tr.td: THE 1950s
KATHARINE HEPBURN
MAGAZINES
NICKNAMES
SALAD DAYS
4-LETTER WORDS
